channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Weight-loss drug manufacturer Novo Nordisk cuts 9000 jobs — and its profit forecast
item.description: New CEO Mike Doustdar is kitchen-sinking the costs of restructuring the company to focus on diabetes and anti-obesity drugs.

item.title: Tesla is losing U.S. market share. And that’s in the middle of an EV boom.
item.description: Has Tesla lost is ‘aura’? Tesla Inc.’s share of the U.S. EV market has fallen to its lowest on record, despite a boom for EV sales in the U.S.

item.title: My husband sold his IRA without my knowledge prior to our divorce. Is this legal?
item.description: “Is it legal for one member of a married couple to authorize the sale of an IRA In a joint managed account?”

item.title: Incomes rose and poverty fell last year — so why do so many Americans feel ‘tapped out’?
item.description: Census numbers show “the middle class is tapped out,” economist says.

item.title: Judge rules Lisa Cook can stay at the Fed, for now. She’ll likely vote at this month’s rate-setting meeting.
item.description: A judge has ruled that Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook should stay in her post for the time being, likely preserving her vote at the central bank’s...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
